# Sourcing function from another script 
```{r}
source(here::here("src", "storm_runoff.R"))
i_a_vals <- seq(from = 0.6, to = 0.8, by = 0.01)
runoff_volumes <- predict_runoff(i_a = i_a_vals, a = 182)

print(runoff_volumes)


runoff_df <- data.frame(i_a_vals, runoff_volumes)

library(ggplot2)
runoff_df |> ggplot(aes(i_a_vals, runoff_volumes)) + geom_line() + geom_point() + theme_bw() + labs(x = "Fraction of Impervious Cover in Watershed (I_a)", y = "Predicted Runoff Volumes of Stormwater (cubic-ft)", title = "Predicted Volumes of Stormwater Runoff in a Specific Watershed")

```
